page.title: 12EDUCATION IN STAMBOURNE 2
page.content: Children under school age can attend a playgroup in Toppesfield. A few go to a private nursery school in Halstead. About 4 school-age children attend private schools in Barnardiston and Stoke-by-Clare. Pupils remain at Hedingham until age 16 at least. Some young people from Stambourne attend courses at Braintree College of Further Education. Adults can attend day and evening classes at Hedingham, Halstead and Haverhill. Sports activities are especially popular, but crafts, languages and other skills are also available.
